subtitle.line: JANE AND TOM AT THE SEASIDE
JANE AND TOM AT THE SEASIDE

line.words: Jann ak frè li, Tòm, ret ka grann yo k ap viv tou prè lanmè a.

subtitle.line: Jane and her brother, Tom, are staying with their Grandma who lives by the sea.
Jane and her brother, Tom, are staying with their Grandma who lives by the sea.

line.words: Lendi, Jann di Grann ni, “Tanpri, èske nou ka ale nan plaj jodi a?” Grann reponn “Pa jodi a. Jodi a gen anpil moun, epi plaj la sal, li chaje ak ti wòch galèt.”

subtitle.line: On Monday, Jane says to Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Not today,” says Grandma. “It is very crowded and the beach is dirty and pebbly.”
On Monday, Jane says to Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Not today,” says Grandma. “It is very crowded and the beach is dirty and pebbly.”

line.words: Madi, Tòm di Grann ni, “Tanpri, èske nou ka ale nan plaj jodi a?” Grann reponn “Pa jodi a. Tan an pare, epi falèz la danjere. Pa gen okenn moun sou plaj la jodi a.”

subtitle.line: On Tuesday, Tom says to Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Not today,” says Grandma. “It is cloudy and the cliff is dangerous. The beach is empty.”
On Tuesday, Tom says to Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Not today,” says Grandma. “It is cloudy and the cliff is dangerous. The beach is empty.”

line.words: Mèkredi, Jann ak Tòm di Grann yo, “Tanpri, èske nou ka ale nan plaj jodi a?” Grann yo reponn “Wi. Gen solèy, epi syèl la ble. Jodi a lanmè an pa danjere, epi sab la jòn e li pwòp tou.”

subtitle.line: On Wednesday, Jane and Tom say to their Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Yes,” says Grandma. “It is sunny and the sky is blue. The sea is safe and the sand is yellow and clean.”
On Wednesday, Jane and Tom say to their Grandma, “Please, can we go to the beach today?” “Yes,” says Grandma. “It is sunny and the sky is blue. The sea is safe and the sand is yellow and clean.”

line.words: Plaj la byen bèl. Jann, Tòm ak Grann yo, yo twa chita sou sèvyèt yo anba yon parasòl vèt. yo met chapo ble pal, epi yo gen bon ti manje nan panye piknik yo a.

subtitle.line: The beach is beautiful. Jane, Tom and Grandma sit under a green umbrella on their towels. They wear light blue hats and they have a lovely picnic in a basket.
The beach is beautiful. Jane, Tom and Grandma sit under a green umbrella on their towels. They wear light blue hats and they have a lovely picnic in a basket.

line.words: Grann mande “Kisa ou wè?” Jann gade sou lanmè a epi li di, “Mwen wè yon ti bato a vwal wouj k ap navige, epi gen yon gwo bato a vapè.”

subtitle.line: “What can you see?” asks Grandma. Jane looks at the sea and says, “A small boat with a red sail is gliding Bonjoung and there is a big steamer.”
“What can you see?” asks Grandma. Jane looks at the sea and says, “A small boat with a red sail is gliding Bonjoung and there is a big steamer.”

line.words: Grann mande “Kisa ou wè?” Tòm reponn, “Mwen wè yon chen wouj k ap siveye yon ti bebe fi k ap dòmi sou sabl plaj la.”

subtitle.line: “What can you see?” asks Grandma.Tom says, “A brown dog is watching a little girl sleeping on the sandy beach.”
“What can you see?” asks Grandma.Tom says, “A brown dog is watching a little girl sleeping on the sandy beach.”

line.words: Grann mande, “Kisa madàm nan ap fè?” Jann reponn “L ap bwose cheve li.”

subtitle.line: “What is the woman doing?” asks Grandma. “She is brushing her hair”, says Jane.
“What is the woman doing?” asks Grandma. “She is brushing her hair”, says Jane.

line.words: Grann mande, “Kisa mesye a ap fè?” Tòm reponn “L ap pwomennen bò lanmè a.”

subtitle.line: “What is the man doing?” asks Grandma. “He is walking round the bay”, says Tom.
“What is the man doing?” asks Grandma. “He is walking round the bay”, says Tom.

line.words: Yo pase yon bèl ti jounen. Jann ak tòm naje nan lanmè ble a. Yo jwenn kèk kokiy blan nan yon kav, epi yo monte sou kèk wòch. Aprè sa a, yo tounen lakay, ak fatig men kè kontan.

subtitle.line: They have a lovely day. Jane and Tom swim in the blue sea. They find some white shells in a cave and climb some rocks. Then they all go home, tired but happy.
They have a lovely day. Jane and Tom swim in the blue sea. They find some white shells in a cave and climb some rocks. Then they all go home, tired but happy.
